channel.title: How do i edit items requiriments?
channel.description:
[b]How do i edit my item requiriments? example:Rune arrows need 40 def to wear...How i turn it on 1? Please help...[/b]
:eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2007, 06:18:30 AM[/size][hr]Can anyone please help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2007, 06:34:41 AM[/size][hr]was it a "We really dont know how to change it?" lol...

item.title: How do i edit items requiriments?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

if you want something specific like just a dragon halberd, you would have to serch the requirement for “dragon”

and add && itemID != ( ID )

( note that idk if that is the real code for itemID becuase im at school )

Now you have to add your Item Requirement as well.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit items requiriments?

item.title: How do i edit items requiriments?
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Like that was helpful…

on the client.java search up w/e it says like “you need 70 attack to wield this weapon” that was an example, hope this helped…
